name: AddUserToTeam
description:
Add a user to a team in Datadog.

Use this tool to add a specified user to an existing team within Datadog by providing the team ID.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to which the user will be added. This is required to specify the target team.

parameters.name: team_membership_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of team membership. Use 'team_memberships'.

parameters.name: provisioning_mechanism
parameters.description: Mechanism responsible for provisioning the team relationship. Possible values: null for user-added, "service_account" for service account, "saml_mapping" for SAML mapping.

value_schema.description:
The mechanism responsible for provisioning the team relationship.
Possible values: null for added by a user, "service_account" if added by a service account, and "saml_mapping" if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: provisioned_user_or_service_account_id
parameters.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned the team membership, or null if done via SAML mapping.

value_schema.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned this team membership, or null if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: user_role_in_team
parameters.description: Specifies the user's role within the team. Currently, only 'admin' is supported as a role.

value_schema.description: The user's role within the team

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the team to which the user will be added.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team associated with the membership

parameters.name: user_team_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type for the team relationship, fixed as 'team'.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to be added to the team in Datadog.

value_schema.description: The ID of the user associated with the team

parameters.name: user_team_user_type
parameters.description: Set to 'users' as the type for the user in the team.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.provisioned_by
parameters.description:
The mechanism responsible for provisioning the team relationship.
Possible values: null for added by a user, "service_account" if added by a service account, and "saml_mapping" if provisioned via SAML mapping.

value_schema.description:
The mechanism responsible for provisioning the team relationship.
Possible values: null for added by a user, "service_account" if added by a service account, and "saml_mapping" if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: data.attributes.provisioned_by_id
parameters.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned this team membership, or null if provisioned via SAML mapping.

value_schema.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned this team membership, or null if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: data.attributes.role
parameters.description: The user's role within the team

value_schema.description: The user's role within the team

parameters.name: data.relationships.team.data.id
parameters.description: The ID of the team associated with the membership

value_schema.description: The ID of the team associated with the membership

parameters.name: data.relationships.user.data.id
parameters.description: The ID of the user associated with the team

value_schema.description: The ID of the user associated with the team
